statements: SELECT * FROM motion_sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM motion_sensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE
SELECT id, timestamp FROM motion_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_id FROM motion_sensors WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%bedroom%'
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 10;
SELECT sensor_location, timestamp FROM motion_sensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT id, sensor_id, sensor_location FROM motion_sensors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, sensor_location FROM motion_sensors GROUP BY sensor_location HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM MotionSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Infrared'
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM MotionSensors ORDER BY sensor_location DESC
SELECT * FROM MotionSensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type FROM MotionSensors WHERE sensor_location LIKE 'Kitchen%'
SELECT * FROM ActionsAndRoutines
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM MotionSensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ActionsAndRoutines WHERE action_name LIKE '%lights%' AND routine_execution_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
SELECT action_id, action_name, trigger_condition FROM ActionsAndRoutines ORDER BY action_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type, timestamp FROM MotionSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'infrared' OR sensor_type = 'ultrasonic' ORDER BY sensor_location ASC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type, motion_detected, timestamp FROM MotionSensors WHERE timestamp >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY);
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM motion_sensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM actions ORDER BY action_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE schedule = 'daily';
SELECT routine_name, action_name, description FROM routines JOIN actions ON routines.action_id = actions.id;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT sensor_name, motion_detected FROM motion_sensors WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM actions WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM routines INNER JOIN actions ON routines.action_id = actions.id WHERE routines.schedule LIKE '%Monday%' ORDER BY routine_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sensors FROM motion_sensors GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM motion_sensors ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM motion_sensors WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM routines WHERE description ILIKE '%important%';
SELECT action_name, command FROM actions WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM motion_sensors WHERE status = true;
SELECT * FROM actions WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT sensor_data.timestamp, sensor_data.value FROM sensor_data INNER JOIN motion_sensors ON sensor_data.sensor_id = motion_sensors.id WHERE motion_sensors.location = 'Kitchen';
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(id) AS count FROM motion_sensors GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM MotionSensorData WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_id, room_id, timestamp FROM MotionSensorData WHERE room_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM User WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT action_name, device_id, command FROM Action WHERE command = 'turn_on';
SELECT * FROM Room WHERE room_name LIKE '%Living%';
SELECT * FROM MotionSensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, room_id, sensor_type, motion_detected, timestamp FROM MotionSensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'Infrared' AND motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM User WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Routine WHERE routine_name LIKE 'Morning%';
SELECT action_id, action_name, device_id, command FROM Action WHERE device_id = 'a56af02e-7945-4a25-aaad-2612670615a3';
